      void WorkerThread.ProcessActivity.noDocument(java.lang.String documentIdentifier, java.lang.String version)
      Remove the specified document from the search engine index, while keeping track of the version information for it (to reduce churn).
      void WorkerThread.ProcessActivity.noDocument(java.lang.String documentIdentifier, java.lang.String componentIdentifier, java.lang.String version)
      Remove the specified document from the search engine index, and update the recorded version information for the document.
      void WorkerThread.ProcessActivity.removeDocument(java.lang.String documentIdentifier)
      Remove the specified document primary component permanently from the search engine index, and from the status table.
